title: Khloe Kardashian Wanted Tristan Thompson During True's Birth Despite Cheating
text:
Khloe Kardashian recently opened up about a complex and sensitive situation she faced with her ex-boyfriend and the father of her two children, Tristan Thompson, in a new episode of her podcast, “Khloé in Wonder Land.” While talking to her guest and a fellow podcaster, Mel Robbins, she revealed why she decided to let Thompson be present during her firstborn daughter, True’s birth, despite the fact that he cheated on her.
Khloe Kardashian recalls complex situation with ex Tristan Thompson in podcast In a recent episode of her podcast, “Khloé in Wonder Land” with guest, Mel Robbins, Khloe Kardashian went candid about how she managed to go through the repercussions of her ex-boyfriend Tristan Thompson’s public cheating scandal just two days before she gave birth to her first child, True. The media personality disclosed that her personal experience from her first marriage with Lamar Odom helped her to face the complex situation.
Khloe Kardashian said, “Well the crazy thing is I would draw back to the feelings I had with Lamar.” She continued, “Lamar was my first husband —where I would say, ‘Okay.’ I knew how to deal with this media scandal.” The media personality further explained, “And I just knew sort of to stay away from the noise, which L.A. has a lot of noise.” “Stayed away from my phone, but I would say the biggest was I had a brand new baby and I definitely isolated,” she added.
However, Khloe Kardashian revealed that she “wasn’t in denial about all the noise.” She “didn’t want to pay attention to it. The star further talked about why she let Tristan Thompson stay during True’s delivery. She said, “And I remember when Tristan had an affair, it was public and I gave birth 48 hours later.” She continued, “And people were like, ‘Do you want him in the hospital room when you’re giving birth?’ And it was my first baby and I said, ‘I do.'”
Khloe Kardashian disclosed that it was all for the sake of her daughter True. She expressed, “I was thinking for my daughter True.” “I thought of her. I was like, ‘For her memories, I want her to know her dad was in the room,” she further explained.
